description: This table contains information for other paid amounts for a single National Drug Code (NDC) code on a pharmacy claim.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OTHR_AMT_CODE_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.
